original: // gcod kyi chad tho btang ba ni /
analyzed: gcod kyi chad tho gtong ba ni

original: gtor ma la sman raka sbran te /
analyzed: thor ma la sman raka sbron te

original: b+h+yo / sngon tshe bskal pa dang po 'das dus su //
analyzed: b+h+yo sngon tshe bskal ba dang po da dus su

original: gzhi med rtsa ba bral ba'i gnas mchog tu //
analyzed: gzhi med rtsa ba bral ba gnas mchog tu

original: ngo bo ngos bzung bral ba'i slob dpon gyis //
analyzed: ngo bo ngos bzung bral ba slob dpon gyis

original: gzung yul rig dang bral ba'i slob ma la //
analyzed: gzung yul rig dang bral ba slob ma la

original: rnam rtog mtshan ma bral ba'i dbang bskur tshe //
analyzed: rnam rtogs mtshan ma bral ba dbang skur tshe

original: sngar ma 'das pa'i rtogs pa kun 'dus nas //
analyzed: sngar ma da ba rtogs ba kun du nas

original: chos sku ye sangs rgyas par ma chad dam //
analyzed: chos sku ye sangs rgya ba ma chad dam

original: tshogs drug 'gyu ba'i gtor ma 'di bzhes la //
analyzed: tshogs drug gyu ba thor ma di bzhes la

original: chos sku zang thal grub pa'i phrin las mdzod //
analyzed: chos sku zang thal grub ba phrin las mdzod

original: da lta bar gyi rtog pa bar ma la //
analyzed: da lta ba gyi rtogs ba ba ma la

original: snang ba ma 'gags gsal ba'i gnas mchog tu //
analyzed: snang ba ma gag gsal ba gnas mchog tu

original: ci shar zhing khams rgyas pa'i slob dpon gyis //
analyzed: ci char zhing khams rgya ba slob dpon gyis

original: blo rtog spros pa chod pa'i slob ma la //
analyzed: blo rtogs spros ba chod ba slob ma la

original: rig pa mngon sum bstan pa'i dbang bskur tshe //
analyzed: rig ba mngon sum ston ba dbang skur tshe

original: de la gnas pa'i dran rtog kun 'dus nas //
analyzed: de la gnas ba dran rtogs kun du nas

original: longs sku nyams snang 'phel ba'i phrin las mdzod //
analyzed: longs sku nyams snang phel ba phrin las mdzod

original: gdod nas ma 'ong rtog pa'itha ma la //
analyzed: gdod nas ma ng rtogs patha ma la

original: ci shar rjes med yal ba'i gnas mchog tu //
analyzed: ci char rjes med yal ba gnas mchog tu

original: 'khor 'das thig le rdzogs pa'i slob dpon gyis //
analyzed: khor da thig le rdzogs ba slob dpon gyis

original: bzang ngan blo dang bral ba'i slob ma la //
analyzed: bzang ngan blo dang bral ba slob ma la

original: rdzogs rim ming dang bral ba'i dbang bskur tshe //
analyzed: rdzogs rim ming dang bral ba dbang skur tshe

original: ma 'ong slad kyi dran pa kun 'dus nas //
analyzed: ma ng slad kyi dran ba kun du nas

original: 'bras bu sku gsum thob par ma chad dam //
analyzed: bras bu sku gsum thob ba ma chad dam

original: ka dag dmigs gtad bral ba'i gtor ma bzhes //
analyzed: ka dag dmigs gtod bral ba thor ma bzhes

original: 'bras bu chos zad blo 'das grub par mdzod //
analyzed: bras bu chos zad blo da grub ba mdzod

original: phata phata phatah ces gtor skyems gtsang sar mchod /
analyzed: phata phata phatah ces thor skyem gtsang sar mchod

original: 'di'i byung khung ming gsal yang cho ga spyi'i 'grigs ltar nye bar mkho ba'i phyir mkhan sa man+ta'i gcod pod nang gi phyag bris ji lta ba zhal bshus pa dge legs 'phel ////
analyzed: di byung khung ming gsal yang cho ga spyi grig ltar nye ba mkho ba phyir mkhan sa man+ta gcod pod nang gi phyag bri ji lta ba zhal bshus ba dge legs phel
